description: Time slice for the first year of the ScenarioMIP SSP5-85 (high forcing scenario) experiment.
long_name: SSTs, forcings, and other prescribed conditions from year 2020 of SSP5-8.5
rationale: To assess radiative forcing of G6sulfur and G6solar at the beginning of the simulation (2020).

requirements.description: Idealised temporal constraint, repeating 2020 for 10 years, to coincide with the first year of the ScenarioMIP SSP5-85 experiment
requirements.label: 2020-2021 10yrs1

requirements.description: 2020 sea surface temperature from the SSP5-85 ScenarioMIP experiment.
requirements.label: SSP5-85SST2020

requirements.description: 2020 sea ice concentration from the SSP5-85 ScenarioMIP experiment.
requirements.label: SSP5-85SIC2020

requirements.description:
Impose RCP8.5 forcing.
Represents the high end of the range of plausible future forcing pathways.
requirements.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 8.5, future, 21st century, SSP5, RCP8.5
requirements.label: RCP85Forcing

requirements.description: Initialisation is from the beginning of year 2020 of the SSP5-8.5 experiment.
requirements.keywords: initial conditions, initialisation, ssp5-8.5, year 2020, scenario
requirements.label: SSP5-85Initialisation2020

requirements.description: An Atmosphere only general circulation model configuration.
requirements.label: AGCM Configuration
